DataElement.preferredName: Contrast Enhanced PET-CT Scan Total Metabolic Tumor Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The value representing the uptake of a radioactive tracer by metabolically active tumor segments obtained from a contrast enhanced PET-CT scan.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Contrast Enhanced PET-CT Scan Total Metabolic Tumor Volume
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A form of PET/CT imaging in which radiopharmaceuticals is either ingested or injected intravenously in an attempt to enhance the collected images for diagnostic purposes.:A measure of the viable fraction of tumors. It is determined by measuring the uptake of a radioactive tracer by metabolically active tumor segments using positron emission tomography and is useful in assessing treatment response and predicting patient outcome.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A form of PET/CT imaging in which radiopharmaceuticals is either ingested or injected intravenously in an attempt to enhance the collected images for diagnostic purposes.

Concepts.definition: A form of PET/CT imaging in which radiopharmaceuticals is either ingested or injected intravenously in an attempt to enhance the collected images for diagnostic purposes.

Property.preferredDefinition: A measure of the viable fraction of tumors. It is determined by measuring the uptake of a radioactive tracer by metabolically active tumor segments using positron emission tomography and is useful in assessing treatment response and predicting patient outcome.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
